name: radioactivity_concentration_of_130I_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "I" means the element "iodine" and "130I" is the isotope "iodine-130" with a half-life of 5.18e-01 days.
